articles.title: Israel’s war on Gaza: Are boycotts hurting US brands? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: McDonald’s is the latest of several brands to report a sales dip in Asia and the Middle East.
articles.content:
McDonalds has missed sales targets partly due to boycotts against its products in some parts of the world over its perceived support for Israel, the company says.

articles.title: BP profits plunge as oil prices ease - BBC.com
articles.description: The energy giant will hand billions of pounds to investors and ramp up oil production.
articles.content:
Energy giant BP has reported its second highest annual profit in more than a decade, despite it being half the level it announced in the previous year.
